item.title: AMD 向人工智能初创企业寻求芯片和软件设计灵感
item.description: 先进微设备公司（Advanced Micro Devices）与一批人工智能初创企业建立了密切的联系，这也是该公司加强软件和打造卓越芯片设计的努力的一部分。【原文：Advanced Micro Devices has forged close ties to a batch of artificial intelligence startups as part of the company's effort to bolster its software and forge superior chip designs.】

item.title: 巴西牛肉大亨在华尔街上市标志着从流亡中回归
item.description: 巴西肉类加工企业 JBS 周五开始在纽约证券交易所交易，这是约埃斯利-巴蒂斯塔和韦斯利-巴蒂斯塔兄弟在创纪录的腐败丑闻中锒铛入狱、被迫退出其全球食品帝国后不到十年时间里的一次惊人复出。【原文：Brazilian meatpacker JBS begins trading on the New York Stock Exchange on Friday, capping a stunning comeback by brothers Joesley and Wesley Batista less than a decade after they were jailed in a record-breaking corruption scandal and forced into the backseat of their global food empire.】

item.title: 华尔街一周前瞻 美联储会议成焦点，投资者寻求利率路径暗示
item.description: 未来一周，投资者在权衡美国股市反弹的风险时，将重点关注美联储在对劳动力市场疲软和通胀仍高于目标的担忧之间的平衡。【原文：The Federal Reserve's balancing act between concerns about a weakening labor market and still above-target inflation will take center stage for investors in the coming week as they weigh risks to the rally in the U.S. stock market.】

item.title: 关税风险大于通胀数据，美联储有望维持利率稳定
item.description: 人们普遍预计美联储下周将维持利率稳定，投资者将重点关注央行的新预测，这些预测将显示决策者对近期疲软数据的重视程度，以及他们对尚未解决的贸易和预算问题的风险程度。【原文：The Federal Reserve is widely expected to hold interest rates steady next week, with investors focused on new central bank projections that will show how much weight policymakers are putting on recent soft data and how much risk they attach to unresolved trade and budget issues.】

item.title: 德国电信与 Nvidia 将在德国打造面向行业的人工智能云
item.description: 德国电信（Deutsche Telekom）和英伟达（Nvidia）周五表示，两家公司将联手在德国为欧洲制造商打造一个工业人工智能云，这在同类产品中尚属首次。【原文：Deutsche Telekom and Nvidia will join forces to build an industrial artificial intelligence cloud for European manufacturers in Germany, the first of its kind, the companies said on Friday.】

item.title: 以色列袭击伊朗后美国股指期货下跌
item.description: 以色列对伊朗的军事打击加剧了石油资源丰富的中东地区的紧张局势，打击了全球市场的风险情绪，周五美国股指期货下跌。【原文：U.S. stock index futures dropped on Friday after Israel's military strike on Iran escalated tensions in the oil-rich Middle East and battered risk sentiment across global markets.】

item.title: 诺和诺德重夺欧洲最有价值公司桂冠
item.description: 诺和诺德制药公司周五再次成为欧洲市值最大的公司，超过了德国软件公司SAP。【原文：Drugmaker Novo Nordisk is once again Europe's largest company by market capitalisation, rising above German software firm SAP on Friday.】

item.title: 欧元区 4 月工业和贸易在关税动荡中遭受重创
item.description: 欧元区的工业和贸易在 4 月份遭受重创，这很可能是美国宣布征收关税的结果，这对经济学家认为欧元区在经济动荡中表现良好的观点提出了挑战。【原文：Euro zone industry and trade took major hits in April, likely reflecting U.S. tariffs announcements, challenging the view of economists that the bloc is holding up well in the face of economic turmoil.】

item.title: 阿斯利康同意与 CSPC 签订价值高达 52.2 亿美元的研究协议
item.description: 阿斯利康（AstraZeneca）周五表示，它已同意与中国制药商中生制药达成一项价值高达 52.2 亿美元的研究协议，双方将重点开展人工智能项目。【原文：AstraZeneca said on Friday it has agreed to a research deal with Chinese drugmaker CSPC Pharmaceuticals worth up to $5.22 billion to focus on AI-enabled initiatives.】

item.title: 汉莎航空为第三季度飞往美国的航班需求下降做好准备
item.description: 德国汉莎航空公司（Lufthansa）首席执行官卡斯滕-斯波尔（Carsten Spohr）表示，在经历了夏季的繁荣之后，第三季度飞往美国的航班需求将有所减弱。【原文：Germany's Lufthansa is bracing for weaker demand in the third quarter for flights to the United States after a boom in the summer, according to CEO Carsten Spohr.】

item.title: 分析师称，申银万国计划在香港上市将受益于更广泛的资本池
item.description: 分析师说，Shein计划在香港上市，这将有助于这家在线快速时尚零售商避免投资者对其供应链的严格审查，同时从内地和新兴市场投资者那里获得资金。【原文：Shein's planned listing in Hong Kong will help the online fast-fashion retailer avoid sharp investor scrutiny of its supply chains while tapping into capital from the mainland and emerging market investors, analysts said.】

item.title: Lone Star 同意以 73.9 亿美元的价格将葡萄牙 Novo Banco 银行出售给法国 BPCE 银行
item.description: BPCE 周五表示，美国私募股权基金 Lone Star 已同意向法国银行集团 BPCE 出售其在 Novo Banco 持有的 75% 股份，该交易对葡萄牙第四大银行的估值为 64 亿欧元（73.9 亿美元）。【原文：U.S. private equity fund Lone Star has agreed to sell its 75% stake in Novo Banco to French banking group BPCE in a deal that evaluates Portugal's fourth-largest lender at 6.4 billion euros ($7.39 billion), BPCE said on Friday.】

item.title: 独家：文件显示，象牙海岸工人称联合利华在出售股份时侵犯了他们的工会权利
item.description: 文件显示，联合利华在象牙海岸的工人称，这家全球消费品巨头违反了他们的集体谈判协议，拒绝保证在公司出售其在当地的业务后裁员时支付遣散费。【原文：Unilever workers in Ivory Coast say the global consumer goods giant is violating their collective bargaining agreement in refusing to ensure severance pay if layoffs take place after the company sells its business there, documents show.】

item.title: 草案显示欧盟核能计划需要 2,410 亿欧元投资
item.description: 欧盟委员会周五表示，欧盟国家扩大核能的计划将需要2,410亿欧元（2,780亿美元）的投资，并需要新的融资工具来降低这些巨额成本给私人投资者带来的风险。【原文：European Union countries' plans to expand nuclear energy will require 241 billion euros ($278 billion) in investments, and new funding instruments to make these huge costs less risky for private investors, the European Commission said on Friday.】

item.title: Counterpoint Research称苹果iPhone 5月销量居中国市场首位
item.description: Counterpoint Research 公司的数据显示，苹果公司的 iPhone 5 月份在中国的销量上升至第一位，4 月和 5 月期间的全球销量同比增长 15%，这是自 COVID-19 大流行以来该科技巨头在这两个月期间的最强劲表现。【原文：Apple's iPhone sales rose to the top spot in China in May, with global sales growing 15% year-on-year during April and May in the tech giant's strongest performance for the two-month period since the COVID-19 pandemic, data from Counterpoint Research showed.】

item.title: 特斯拉在美国升级其 Model S 和 X 汽车，价格上涨 5,000 美元
item.description: 特斯拉周四表示，该公司升级了其在美国的Model S和Model X汽车，并将价格提高了5000美元。【原文：Tesla said on Thursday it upgraded its Model S and Model X cars in the U.S. and raised their prices by $5,000, according to the electric vehicle maker's post on X and its website.】

item.title: 趋势型对冲基金举步维艰，因为更灵活的宏观基金正拥抱风起云涌的市场
item.description: 今年迄今为止，对冲基金的回报率显示，那些能够驾驭美国总统唐纳德-特朗普反复无常的决策并迅速转换策略的基金与那些受制于算法策略的基金之间存在着明显的差距。【原文：Hedge fund returns so far this year show a stark divide between those that have been able to navigate U.S. President Donald Trump's erratic decision making and switch tactics quickly and those hemmed in by algorithmic strategies.】

item.title: 特朗普发布行政命令后，空中出租车制造商 Archer 筹集了 8.5 亿美元资金
item.description: 空中出租车制造商 Archer Aviation 周四表示，在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普签署了促进电动空中出租车发展的行政命令后，该公司筹集了 8.5 亿美元资金。【原文：Air taxi maker Archer Aviation on Thursday said it raised $850 million in funding following executive orders signed by U.S. President Donald Trump to boost electric air taxis.】

item.title: 欧洲 13 日星期五，德黑兰发生爆炸，人们争相逃往安全避难所
item.description: 洛基-斯威夫特对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Rocky Swift】

item.title: 据英国《金融时报》报道，中国推迟批准 Synopsys 和 Ansys 350 亿美元的合并案
item.description: 据英国《金融时报》周五报道，中国国家市场监督管理总局已推迟批准两家软件公司--Synopsys 和 Ansys 之间价值 350 亿美元的拟议合并。【原文：China’s State Administration for Market Regulation has postponed its approval of a proposed $35 billion merger between two software companies - Synopsys and Ansys , the Financial Times reported on Friday.】

item.title: Meta 的 Scale AI 股权收购凸显监管风险下的其他重大交易
item.description: 据知情人士透露，Meta 公司已敲定以 143 亿美元收购数据标签初创公司 Scale AI 49% 的股份。【原文：Meta has finalized a $14.3 billion purchase of a 49% stake in data labeling startup Scale AI, according to sources familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 独家报道苹果应对特朗普关税，富士康将 97% 的印度 iPhone 出口到美国
item.description: 海关数据显示，3 月至 5 月间，富士康从印度出口的 iPhone 几乎全部销往美国，远高于 2024 年 50%的平均水平，这清楚地表明了苹果为绕过美国对中国征收的高额关税所做的努力。【原文：Nearly all the iPhones exported by Foxconn from India went to the United States between March and May, customs data showed, far above the 2024 average of 50% and a clear sign of Apple's efforts to bypass high U.S. tariffs imposed on China.】

item.title: 韩国总统李明博在与顶级企业集团会面时承诺支持贸易问题
item.description: 韩国总统李在明周五表示，韩国政府将重点放宽监管，并在贸易问题上为企业提供帮助。【原文：South Korean President Lee Jae-myung said on Friday that his government would focus on easing regulations and helping companies on trade issues.】

item.title: 聚焦：特朗普向日本茶叶巨头的美国扩张计划抛出 "曲线球
item.description: 日本顶级茶叶品牌伊藤园（Ito En）最近试图以其传统的不加糖茶赢得注重健康的美国消费者的青睐，但却遇到了新的障碍：唐纳德-特朗普总统的贸易关税。【原文：Top Japanese tea brand Ito En's latest push to win over health-conscious U.S. customers with its traditional unsweetened brew has hit a new road bump: President Donald Trump's trade tariffs.】

item.title: 日本最高关税谈判代表拒绝与美国达成部分协议的说法
item.description: 东京首席关税谈判代表赤泽亮世周五表示，日本将坚定不移地要求对美国关税进行复审，并且不会接受部分协议。【原文：Japan will remain steadfast in its request for a review of U.S. tariffs and would not accept a partial agreement, Tokyo's chief tariff negotiator Ryosei Akazawa said on Friday.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，SBI新生银行计划在七月申请年底重新上市
item.description: 两位熟悉内情的人士称，SBI控股公司旗下的SBI新生银行计划最早于下月申请在东京证券交易所重新上市。【原文：SBI Shinsei Bank, a unit of SBI Holdings , is planning on filing as early as next month to relist on the Tokyo Stock Exchange, two people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 部长称日本持有的美国国债不是贝森特会议的议题
item.description: 日本财务大臣加藤胜信周五表示，在过去与美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）的会晤中，他没有具体讨论过日本持有的1万多亿美元美国国债问题。【原文：Japanese Finance Minister Katsunobu Kato said on Friday he had not specifically discussed Japan's $1 trillion-plus holdings of U.S. Treasury securities during past meetings with U.S. Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent.】

item.title: Meta 完成对 Scale AI 的投资，初创公司估值达 290 亿美元
item.description: Scale AI 周四表示，Meta Platforms 已敲定对 Scale AI 的投资，对这家初创公司的估值超过 290 亿美元。【原文：Meta Platforms has finalized an investment in Scale AI that values the startup at over $29 billion, Scale AI said on Thursday.】

item.title: 以色列打击伊朗，美元和其他避风港上涨
item.description: 美元与避险货币日元和瑞士法郎一起反弹，货币市场因以色列对伊朗发动打击的消息而突然逆转方向。【原文：The U.S. dollar rallied alongside the safe-haven Japanese yen and Swiss franc, with currency markets abruptly reversing direction on news Israel had launched strikes on Iran.】

item.title: 以色列袭击伊朗后油价跳涨逾 4 美元
item.description: 在以色列表示打击伊朗之后，周五油价每桶跳涨超过 4 美元，这引发了人们对中东紧张局势升级可能影响石油供应的担忧。【原文：Oil prices jumped more than $4 a barrel on Friday after Israel said it struck Iran, raising concerns of escalating tensions in the Middle East that may affect oil supplies.】
